OOC: I'm back from my holiday break. Sorry about leaving you hanging.

::Rodimus Prime::

Rodimus awakes as his comm goes off some time later. He notices that 
Nightlight is asleep, her arms wrapped around him. He then rememberes 
what had happened and smiled. His comm went off again and he answers 
it.

Rodimus Prime: I hear you Flicker, what is it?

::Heartbreak::

HBK gets into the chamber and it starts to deck him out in nWo black 
and white.

::Kup::

Kup: I would say that their weapons are of plasma, photon, and fusion 
energy types, as most Cybertronion weapons are.
